name: InstallCosmosDbServerScript
description: Installs a stored procedure, trigger, or user-defined function into a Cosmos DB collection.
author: John Downs

inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Connection type
inputs.helpMarkDown: How the task should connect to Cosmos DB.

options.key: Cosmos DB account key or SAS token

inputs.name: armService
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure Resource Manager service connection to use. This must have `Contributor` rights on the Cosmos DB account.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource group name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the resource group that contains the Cosmos DB account.

inputs.name: accountKey
inputs.label: Cosmos DB account key or SAS token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The key that should be used to communicate with Cosmos DB. This can be obtained from the Azure Portal.

inputs.name: accountName
inputs.label: Cosmos DB account name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Cosmos DB account. This should not include the `.documents.azure.com` suffix.

inputs.name: collectionName
inputs.label: Collection name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unique identifier for the collection and used for id-based routing through REST and all SDKs

inputs.name: databaseName
inputs.label: Database name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the database that contains this collection.

inputs.name: scriptFilePath
inputs.label: Script file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script. Should be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory.

options.ignore: Ignore and leave existing script intact
